name: godot-uid-sync
description: Automatically sync .uid files when renaming or moving Godot resource files in VS Code.

godotUidSync.enabledOnlyInGodotProjects.description: Only activate this extension if a 'project.godot' file exists in the workspace. (Requires window reload)

godotUidSync.excludeExtensions.description: File extensions to ignore when checking for .uid files. Include the dot (e.g., .png)

godotUidSync.linkedExtensions.description: List of file extensions to rename together with associated Godot resources (e.g., .uid, .meta).

godotUidSync.revealOutputOnInfo.description: If true, the output panel will open on info messages. Logs are still written even if this is false.

godotUidSync.revealOutputOnWarn.description: If true, the output panel will open on warning messages. Logs are still written even if this is false.

godotUidSync.revealOutputOnError.description: If true, the output panel will open on error messages. Logs are still written even if this is false.

godotUidSync.showVerbose.description: Show additional tips or internal verbose logs in the output panel. Recommended to turn this off once you understand how the extension works.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
